articles.title: Nigel Lythgoe denies abusing Paula Abdul as sexual assault lawsuit looms - BBC.com
articles.description: The American singer alleges multiple instances of assault while the pair worked together, which Mr Lythgoe denies.
articles.content:
By Jacqueline HowardBBC News
Ms Abdul (bottom right) claims that Mr Lythgoe (top left) first assaulted her during an early season of American Idol
American singer and dancer Paula Abdul is suing Br… [+3377 chars]
